DataElement.preferredName: Pathologic Metastatic Diagnosis Distant Metastasis Anatomic Site
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The named location within the body where the presence of distant metastasis (pM) is documented.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pathologic Metastatic Diagnosis if Documented Distant Metastasis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Caused by or altered by or manifesting disease or pathology._Any diagnosis indicating the presence of metastatic disease._A directive to specify the anatomic location of any documented distant metastasis.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.
